channel.title: Comments on: Beauty Idols: The Contemporary

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-554">Kelly</a>.
See! Kimmie can even get me new readers. She's fabulous! Thanks for reading! XO! KK 4 EVA!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kelly.

See! Kimmie can even get me new readers. She’s fabulous! Thanks for reading! XO! KK 4 EVA!

item.title: By: Kelly
item.dc:creator: Kelly
item.description: I agree with every single word and must start following you immediately! I found your site while reading random posts about the Origins charcoal mask that is currently on my face, but I will stay because of this. I love Kimmie!
item.content:encoded: I agree with every single word and must start following you immediately! I found your site while reading random posts about the Origins charcoal mask that is currently on my face, but I will stay because of this. I love Kimmie!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-519">muddgirl</a>.
*FURIOUSLY GOOGLES EXERCISE TAPE THAT I DID NOT KNOW EXISTED*
I know what you mean about falling in love! She gets such a bad rap, but she seems like she could be really fun to hang out with!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to muddgirl.

*FURIOUSLY GOOGLES EXERCISE TAPE THAT I DID NOT KNOW EXISTED*

I know what you mean about falling in love! She gets such a bad rap, but she seems like she could be really fun to hang out with!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-524">Keri</a>.
That shows her level of commitment to the cause. She shoved her poor feet into those shoes because GLAMOUR.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Keri.

That shows her level of commitment to the cause. She shoved her poor feet into those shoes because GLAMOUR.

item.title: By: Keri
item.dc:creator: Keri
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-522">Sarah Cosper</a>.
Yes, the shoes were horrible. Not because there was anything wrong or unnatural or whatever, about having swollen feet during pregnancy... but just.. OUCH. How about some nice flats? Or wedges? Or less strappy?
But I can't imagine living with the pressure she does to look glam 24/7 so who knows if I would be cramming my feet into something like that too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

Yes, the shoes were horrible. Not because there was anything wrong or unnatural or whatever, about having swollen feet during pregnancy… but just.. OUCH. How about some nice flats? Or wedges? Or less strappy?

But I can’t imagine living with the pressure she does to look glam 24/7 so who knows if I would be cramming my feet into something like that too.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-521">Keri</a>.
THANK YOU! Daily glamour! My biggest issue with her wardrobe during her pregnancy was the shoes! I'd see her poor swollen feet, and be like, "Gurl. Give yourself a break! Ain't no shame in flats!" Oh. That couch dress wasn't great either. But, I think that was mostly the gloves. I would have liked it more without them.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Keri.

THANK YOU! Daily glamour! My biggest issue with her wardrobe during her pregnancy was the shoes! I’d see her poor swollen feet, and be like, “Gurl. Give yourself a break! Ain’t no shame in flats!” Oh. That couch dress wasn’t great either. But, I think that was mostly the gloves. I would have liked it more without them.

item.title: By: Keri
item.dc:creator: Keri
item.description: Another KK lover here :) Although she did make some questionable fashion choices during her pregnancy, I never understood why people attacked her body instead of saying the clothes she wore were unflattering... She makes being glam on a daily basis into something we all strive for.
item.content:encoded:
Another KK lover here ðŸ™‚ Although she did make some questionable fashion choices during her pregnancy, I never understood why people attacked her body instead of saying the clothes she wore were unflattering…
She makes being glam on a daily basis into something we all strive for.

item.title: By: Uncle Ronnie
item.dc:creator: Uncle Ronnie
item.description: Sophia had painfully mottled feet if I remember correctly.
item.content:encoded: Sophia had painfully mottled feet if I remember correctly.

item.title: By: muddgirl
item.dc:creator: muddgirl
item.description:
Sold! No, seriously, how can anyone look at the first pic, the contouring pic, and the Mother Goddess pic without falling in love?
I've never been a <i>fan</i>, per se, but one time, at random, I did one of her exercise tapes and she completely charmed me. I think it was the combination of her self-confidence and her willingness to laugh at herself.
item.content:encoded:
Sold! No, seriously, how can anyone look at the first pic, the contouring pic, and the Mother Goddess pic without falling in love?

I’ve never been a fan, per se, but one time, at random, I did one of her exercise tapes and she completely charmed me. I think it was the combination of her self-confidence and her willingness to laugh at herself.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/beauty-idols-contemporary/#comment-515">Denys</a>.
I love her so much!! Hahaha! I like that you said Sophia Loren, because I was going to say she was a new kind of beauty, but I remembered Sophia. Fabulous!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Denys.

I love her so much!! Hahaha! I like that you said Sophia Loren, because I was going to say she was a new kind of beauty, but I remembered Sophia. Fabulous!
